alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:24PM CDT until July 08 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southwestern Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 223 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Bayard Junction, or 24 miles southeast of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Court House And Jail Rocks, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Chimney Rock State Park, Redington and South Bayard Junction. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
